title: cuwebring.org
description: A place for Carleton University students to share their websites. Currently has 10+ students using it.

title: Timer
description: This Discord bot allows users to create, join, and manage shared timers within a server. Built and self deployed in 2 days.

title: ML Paper Implementations
description: Implementing fundamental machine learning algorithms from scratch. (Still in progress)

title: Rambo the QNX Roomba
description: A Raspberry Pi 4B running QNX controls a Roomba vacuum cleaner equipped with an Arduino and four photoresistors for light-based navigation.

title: Black Scholes Model
description: Replicated the Black Scholes Model in Python. Deployed using streamlit.

title: FoodBank AI
description: A webapp that utilizes computer vision (ResNet) that was finetuned to detect food items from the webcam.

title: Anki Guitar Fretboard
description: Created a custom Anki deck for learning guitar fretboard. Has over 450 downloads with positive reviews.
